attributes.action: Laws for nonblue badge holders parking in disabled bays for blue badge holders
attributes.additional_details: Mny people park in disabled bays that are abled bodied and non blue badge holders - this is a regular occurrence!
attributes.background: I have a 6 year old son who has a blue badge who has a wheelchair and is on a feeding pump. We have to carry round various equipment and medical supplies. We are constantly having to park in other bays as non blue badge holders are parked in disabled bays.
